verbose_text: As the tissue breaks down and the hypoxic decidualised cell mass is shed, a significant increase in Cxcl12 was observed (p < 0.001) consistent with findings from Tsuzuki et al. [XREF_BIBR] who observed a decrease in CXCL12 mRNA expression in human stromal cells under hypoxia in comparison to cells incubated under normoxic conditions.
